info.name: LED Display API - Data File Test Suite
info.description:
Test suite for the /display-text endpoint covering various scenarios including valid messages with icons, invalid Unicode characters, edge cases, and special characters.

This test suite was generated with the following prompt:

> "Can you create a new collection and data file that mixes allowed messages with allowed icons and invalid messages and test whether the expected results occur?"
